description.fr: Vaincre tous les Chuchoteurs. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoque une {Summoning:849!}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Ajoute le sort {Spell:257} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat all the Whisperers. \--- {%FightStarted} Summons one {Summoning:849!}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adds the {Spell:257} spell to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a todos los susurradores. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoca un {Summoning:849!}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Añade el hechizo {Spell:257} a tu mano.
description.de: Alle Flüsterer besiegen. \--- {%FightStarted} Beschwört einen\_{Summoning:849!}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Fügt deiner Hand den Zauber {Spell:257} hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Smagadores. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoca uma {Summoning:849!}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adiciona o feitiço {Spell:257} à sua mão.
